public OrderDTO get(@PathVariable
                                                int id)
                                         throws UnauthorizedAccessException,
                                                ForbiddenAccessException,

        Returns order by identifier with full information.
        Parameters:

        OrderDTO requested order
        Throws:
        UnauthorizedAccessException - if authorization is missing
        ForbiddenAccessException - if user don't have permission to get this order
        ResourceNotFoundException - if order not found
